Key Match Events: Sanju Samson scored only seven runs before being stumped out by Akeal Hosein.
Shubman Gill struggled and was dismissed for 7 runs by Alzarri Joseph.
Suryakumar Yadav got run out early in the innings.
Ishan Kishan scored 27 runs before being bowled out by Romario Shepherd.
Post-Match Reflections: Fans expressed their disappointment on Twitter over Sanju Samson's inconsistency.
Former Indian player Wasim Jaffer commented on Sanju Samson's need to improve his consistency.
